alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Greene; Jefferson; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango; Washington (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 1:56PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT MONROE...CARROLL...EASTERN TUSCARAWAS... NOBLE...COLUMBIANA...BELMONT...EASTERN GUERNSEY...HARRISON... JEFFERSON...BEAVER...VENANGO...WESTERN JEFFERSON...WESTERN GREENE... CLARION...FOREST...MERCER...BUTLER...ALLEGHENY...CENTRAL ARMSTRONG... WASHINGTON...LAWRENCE...OHIO...WETZEL...MARSHALL...BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 154 PM EDT, snow showers were located along a broad line extending from Oil City to Barnesville, moving east northeast at 40 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with these snow showers. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Ross Township, Wheeling, McCandless Township, Cranberry, Moon Township, New Castle, McMurray, Weirton, and Steubenville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 183 and 225. Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 0 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 25. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 1 and 46. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 18 and 30, and between mile markers 35 and 38. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 27 and 138. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 85. Parkway North between mile markers 1 and 13. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 74. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Allegheny; Armstrong; Beaver; Butler; Clarion; Forest; Greene; Jefferson; Lawrence; Mercer; Venango; Washington
